snippet: Franck Ribéry was included in the final 23-man squad for France at the World Cup, even though he is still recovering from a back injury.
abstract: Franck Ribery is included in final 23-man French World Cup squad, despite fact that he is still recovering from a back injury.
lead_paragraph: Franck Ribéry was included in the final 23-man squad for France at the World Cup, even though he is still recovering from a back injury.

headline.main: Ribéry Is Named to French World Cup Squad
headline.print_headline: Ribéry Is Named to French World Cup Squad
